channel.title: Abouts on Shyam Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Shyam Singh

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a student at Carleton University in the Computer Systems Engineering program. My areas of academic interest are machine learning, computer architecture, and digital electronics. In my free time, I enjoy running/hiking, reading, and watching sports (cricket, MMA, and boxing).
